item.title: A pair of userscripts for cleaning up Stack Exchange sites
item.description: I’ve been a regular visitor to Stack Overflow and other Stack Exchange sites over the years, and while I’ve mostly enjoyed the experience, I’ve been frustrated by the lack of control I have over what questions I see. I’m not really interested in looking at questions that have already been closed, or that have a negative score, but there’s no native facility for filtering questions like this. I finally spent the time learning just enough JavaScript to hurt myself to put together a pair of scripts that let me present the questions that way I want:
